meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>instruction</kanji> <kanji>reading</kanji> may not make a lot of sense, but you've heard this word before. Jump to the reading and you'll know what the meaning of this word is.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the word 読み (like 読む) and the reading you learned for 訓 combined, making <reading>くんよ</reading>み. Sounds familiar? It's that <vocabulary>kun'yomi</vocabulary> reading you've heard so much about.
